rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Room
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a small reception area leading into an open-plan living room that integrates Bohemian decor elements, natural light, and vibrant colors.

rooms.name: Kitchen and Dining Area
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with ample storage and state-of-the-art appliances paired with a dining area featuring rustic wooden tables and eclectic decor that follows Bohemian style. Vastu principles ensure the placement of water features near the east.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A quiet, dedicated library space with built-in shelves and comfortable seating. Designed for both reading and contemplation, it includes abundant natural light and is oriented according to Vastu for enhancing concentration.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a private balcony offering a serene view. The room features Bohemian elements, layered textures, and Vastu-aligned sleeping area ensuring calm energy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Well-appointed bedroom with its own balcony for fresh air and a connection to nature. The design includes Bohemian accents and ensures a peaceful environment in line with Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom that provides ample space and a dedicated balcony for natural ventilation, styled with eclectic Bohemian touches.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest room with a balcony to enjoy the outdoors. The design is balanced with both functional storage and Vastu compliance for positive energy flow.

openings.features: Vastu-compliant placement ensuring auspicious entry, complemented by a foyer that enhances the welcoming feel.
Spacious balconies designed for each bedroom to provide ventilation and a connection with nature, adhering to local building norms and Vastu guidelines.
Dual garage door setup for a two-car garage, ensuring easy access while maintaining the aesthetic integrity of the property.
Strategically placed windows to maximize natural light and ventilation, following Vastu principles for optimal energy flow.
